response.overview: On December 3rd GCW: What is Your Choice? is live on FITE+ straight from Roulette Intermedium in Brooklyn, NY. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends his title against Little Guido.  GCW Tag Team Title Match  Violence is Forever (Dominic Garrini & Kevin Ku) (c) vs The Mane Event (Jay Lyon & Midas Black)  Career vs Broski Match  Matt Cardona w/ Steph De Lander vs Jimmy Lloyd  Alex Shelley vs Gringo Loco  Mike Bailey vs Maki Itoh  Tag Team Match  Hammerstone & Richard Holliday vs Charles Mason & Parrow  Non Title Match  Rina Yamashita vs Tony Deppen  Unagi Sayaka vs Billie Starkz
response.title: GCW: What is Your Choice?
